price: 63. S’ils se détournent, alors Allah connaît parfaitement les corrupteurs.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
